price: Yeroo (gara mooraa) galchitaniifi yeroo bobbaaftan (gadi yaaftan) ishee keessa bareedumatu isiniif jira.
arabic: وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا جَمَالٌ حِينَ تُرِيحُونَ وَحِينَ تَسۡرَحُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walakum fīhā jamālun ḥīna turīḥūna waḥīna tasraḥūna
